column2: "Na iyi nye egyapadze a Israelmba nyaa no wɔ Keenan asaase do a ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column4: nye egyanom efiefi etsitsir no a wɔyɛ Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no kyekyɛe maa hɔn
column7: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa mma ebusuakuw akron

column2: "Osiandɛ Moses dze ebusuakuw ebien na fa no hɔn egyapadze ama hɔn wɔ Jordan egya: na Levifo no dze ɔamma hɔn egyapadze bi wɔ hɔn mu."

column3: Manaasɛ nye Efraim: na Levifo dze
column4: wɔammfa kyɛfa biara amma hɔn wɔ asaase no do
column6: nye ne mfikyisaase a wɔdze ma hɔn fiembowa nye hɔn ahodze."

column3: dɛmara so na Israelmba no yɛe

column2: "Nna Judamba twee piin Josua wɔ Gilgal: na Kaleb
column3: Jefune ne babanyin Keniznyi no see no dɛ
column4: Ɔwoara nyim asɛm a EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Nyame nyimpa Moses wɔ mo ho nye wo ho wɔ Kades-barnea."

column2: "Aber a EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses somaa me fi Kades-barnea dɛ menkɛsera asaase no
column3: nna medzi mfe eduanan; na medze asɛm sanee brɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔwɔ m’akoma mu."

column2: "Naaso mo nuanom a wɔnye me fowee kɔree no maa ɔman no hɔn akoma tui: na emi dze
"Na Moses kaa ntam da no ara dɛ
column3: Ampaara asaase a w’anan etsia do no nyɛ wo mba egyapadze daa
column4: osiandɛ edzi EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn ekyir korakorakora."

column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkae no mfe eduanan enum yi
column6: ofi aber a EWURADZE kaa asɛm yi kyerɛɛ Moses
column7: aber a Israel nam sar no do no: na afei
column9: medzi mfe eduowɔtwe enum ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Ndɛ da yi ara mo ho da ho yɛ dzen dɛ mbrɛ metse wɔ da a Moses somaa me no: nkan no mbrɛ m’ahoɔdzen tse no
column3: mekyerɛ seseiara so mbrɛ m’ahoɔdzen tse ara nye no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei fa bepɔw yi a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm da no mu no ma me; na ɔwoara tsee no wɔ da no mu dɛ Anakfo wɔ hɔ
column3: na nkurow a ɔyɛ akɛse na wɔagyegye ho ban: annyɛ a EWURADZE bedzi m’ekyir ma meetu hɔn

column2: "Na Josua hyiraa no; na ɔdze Hebron maa Kaleb
column3: Jefune ne babanyin no dɛ n’egyapadze."

column4: n’egyapadze dze bodu ndɛ da yi; osiandɛ ɔdze n’akoma nyinara dzii EWURADZE

column2: "Asɔpɔn no nkyɛ Hebron ne dzin nye Kiriat-arba; Arba no nye Anakfo mu nyimpa kɛse koraa. Na asaase no do dwee wɔ ɔko ho."
